targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  d.device_id,
  CONCAT('Device ID: ', d.device_id, '; Firmware: ', f.firmware_name, '.', f.latest_version, '; First Activated: ', first_activated, '; Last Connectivity Event: ', TT.max_event_dt, '; Connected') AS device_desc,
  d.latitude + (random()/1000) AS latitude,
  d.longitude + (random()/1000) AS longitude,
  CASE WHEN TT.event_type IS NULL THEN 0.5 WHEN TT.event_type = 'connected' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS device_state
FROM
  public.device d
  
  INNER JOIN (
  
    SELECT
      DEV.device_id,
      MIN(DEV.row_effective_from) AS first_activated
    FROM
      public.device DEV
      INNER JOIN public.firmware F
        ON DEV.firmware_pk_id = F.pk_id
    WHERE
      F.firmware_name <> 'no firmware'
    GROUP BY
      device_id
  
  ) d_first_row
  
  ON d_first_row.device_id = d.device_id
  
  INNER JOIN public.firmware f
    ON f.pk_id = d.firmware_pk_id
  
  LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
  		LE.device_id,
  		LE.event_dt,
      MAX(LE.event_dt) OVER (PARTITION BY LE.device_id) AS max_event_dt,
  		LE.event_type
  	FROM
  		public.device_presence_event LE
  	WHERE
  	  LE.device_id LIKE '%$device_id%'
    	) TT

  ON TT.device_id = d.device_id
  AND TT.event_dt = TT.max_event_dt
WHERE
  d.is_current_row = CAST(1 AS BIT)
  AND d.device_id LIKE '%$device_id%'
  AND f.pk_id IN ($firmware_pk_id)
  --AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM public.device WHERE device_id = d.device_id AND (latitude <> 0.0 OR longitude <> 0.0));

SELECT
  COUNT(TT.*) AS total_count
FROM
  (
  SELECT
  		LE.event_dt,
      MAX(LE.event_dt) OVER (PARTITION BY LE.device_id) AS max_event_dt,
  		LE.event_type
  	FROM
  		public.device_presence_event LE
  	  
  	  INNER JOIN public.device d ON d.device_id = LE.device_id AND d.is_current_row = CAST(1 AS BIT)
  	  INNER JOIN public.firmware f ON f.pk_id = d.firmware_pk_id

    WHERE
      f.pk_id IN ($firmware_pk_id)
      --AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM public.device WHERE device_id = d.device_id AND (latitude <> 0.0 OR longitude <> 0.0))
      AND f.firmware_name <> 'no firmware'
    
  ) TT

WHERE
  TT.event_dt = TT.max_event_dt
  AND TT.event_type = 'connected'

SELECT
  COUNT(TT.*) AS total_count
FROM
  (
  SELECT
  		LE.event_dt,
      MAX(LE.event_dt) OVER (PARTITION BY LE.device_id) AS max_event_dt,
  		LE.event_type
  	FROM
  		public.device_presence_event LE
  	  
  	  INNER JOIN public.device d ON d.device_id = LE.device_id AND d.is_current_row = CAST(1 AS BIT)
  	  INNER JOIN public.firmware f ON f.pk_id = d.firmware_pk_id
    
    WHERE
      f.pk_id IN ($firmware_pk_id)
      AND f.firmware_name <> 'no firmware'
  ) TT

WHERE
  TT.event_dt = TT.max_event_dt
  AND TT.event_type = 'disconnected'

list.definition: SELECT pk_id AS __value, group_name AS __text FROM public.firmware_group ORDER BY group_name
list.label: Firmware Group
list.name: firmware_group_pk_id
list.query: SELECT pk_id AS __value, group_name AS __text FROM public.firmware_group ORDER BY group_name

list.definition: SELECT CONCAT(firmware_name, '.', latest_version) AS __text, pk_id AS __value FROM public.firmware F WHERE firmware_group_pk_id IN ($firmware_group_pk_id) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM public.device WHERE is_current_row = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND firmware_pk_id = F.pk_id AND (latitude <> 0.0 OR longitude <> 0.0)) ORDER BY firmware_name, latest_version
list.label: Firmware
list.name: firmware_pk_id
list.query: SELECT CONCAT(firmware_name, '.', latest_version) AS __text, pk_id AS __value FROM public.firmware F WHERE firmware_group_pk_id IN ($firmware_group_pk_id) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM public.device WHERE is_current_row = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND firmware_pk_id = F.pk_id AND (latitude <> 0.0 OR longitude <> 0.0)) ORDER BY firmware_name, latest_version
